entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Supress CA1861 in migrations files #30961
  • When object repeats itself in lazy loading it is coming null #30960
  • Saving an object with a large number of related children works in EF Core 6 but not in EF Core 7 #30959
  • Consider a related entity loading strategy that uses aggregates dependent collections to a JSON array #30958
  • Obsolete AddAsync and change HiLo to generate IDs at SaveChanges time #30957

PullRequests

Merged

  • Bump SQLitePCLRaw.core from 2.1.4 to 2.1.5 #30953
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Bump Microsoft.AspNetCore.OData from 8.1.2 to 8.2.0 #30950
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:

Updated

  • Bump SQLitePCLRaw.bundle_e_sqlite3 from 2.1.4 to 2.1.5 #30951
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Bump SQLitePCLRaw.bundle_winsqlite3 from 2.1.4 to 2.1.5 #30949
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Normalize Any to Contains instead of vice versa #30956
